welcome_message_body: Welcome to Shishi, China! Get ready to experience the charm of this coastal city known for its beautiful beaches, rich history, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Shishi has to offer.

restaurants.name: 冰岛

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Jinjiang Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
